# Use Case
Describe what you were trying to do.

# Requirement
Describe what you need (For example: I need to do HTTP-POST requests with FormData body)

# Future Requirements / Ideas
Is there anything that might be required later on? (For example: Another user might need to submit POST requests with a JSON body)
